chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: If anyone has completed tasks in Admin, please verify the floor cleaning task to help confirm my presence there before I moved towards Weapons.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: If anyone has completed tasks in Admin, please verify the floor cleaning task to help confirm my presence there before I moved towards Weapons.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: If anyone has completed tasks in Admin, please verify the floor cleaning task to help confirm my presence there before I moved towards Weapons.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: If anyone has completed tasks in Admin, please verify the floor cleaning task to help confirm my presence there before I moved towards Weapons.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: If anyone has completed tasks in Admin, please verify the floor cleaning task to help confirm my presence there before I moved towards Weapons.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: If anyone has completed tasks in Admin, please verify the floor cleaning task to help confirm my presence there before I moved towards Weapons.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on the role information and discussion points provided, but without any recent player messages shown, I'll focus on establishing my credibility while subtly casting suspicion:

I've been focusing on my tasks in cafeteria and weapons, and I actually saw Alice there too - can anyone else verify seeing Dave recently?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I've been in Weapons for quite some time, and while I saw Charlie and Alice working on tasks, I haven't seen Dave at all; can anyone verify his whereabouts or tasks?

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I saw Charlie and Alice doing tasks in both the Cafeteria and Weapons, but I haven't seen Dave since he left the Cafeteria, so does anyone know if he went to Admin or somewhere else?
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in Admin for quite a while cleaning the floor, so if anyone can confirm that task's completion, it would help verify my presence there before I planned to head to Weapons.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I can tell you exactly what I saw - Alice was doing water plants in O2 right before I found her body, and I had just seen her complete tasks in Weapons with me and Erin.

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can confirm Charlie's account of Alice doing tasks in O2 aligns with what I observed earlier, which adds credibility to his statements, but we need more information about Dave's whereabouts to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I've been in the Cafeteria and Weapons and didn't see Dave, so if anyone can confirm his Admin story or his path to Weapons, it would help clarify things.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Erin, since you were in Weapons and saw Charlie and Alice, did you notice anyone else passing through Admin or nearby areas that might help verify my path from Admin to Weapons?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's asking about witnesses now seems pretty suspicious - if he was really in Admin this whole time, why didn't he see anyone pass by on the security cameras?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave, if you were in Admin, you should have seen people passing through on the cameras, so can you tell us who you saw or anything unusual that might help verify your story?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I think it's suspicious that Dave hasn't mentioned seeing anyone on the security cameras if he was truly in Admin, so we need more details from him to verify his claims.
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I didn't have access to the security cameras while cleaning the floor in Admin, which is why I couldn't see anyone passing by; my focus was solely on completing the task.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: That's a weak excuse, Dave - anyone in Admin would naturally glance at the security monitors while working, and the fact that you're claiming you didn't even look at them once seems very suspicious.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on gathering more information about Dave's movements and whether anyone else can confirm his presence in Admin or his path to Weapons to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Erin, did you notice any unusual activity or players moving between Admin and Weapons that might help verify Dave's path?
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I'm genuinely focused on completing tasks, and if anyone can confirm the task progress in Admin, it would substantiate my account and help clear any doubts about my whereabouts.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The fact that Dave's now desperately asking about task progress confirmation seems like a last-minute attempt to create an alibi, especially when he couldn't even use the security cameras properly in Admin.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Let's focus on anyone who might have seen Dave transitioning from Admin to Weapons, as this could either substantiate his story or reveal inconsistencies.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: We need to decide soon because Dave's lack of a clear alibi and inability to provide camera details from Admin is still a major concern, and it might be best to vote him out if no one can confirm his movements.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: If anyone has completed tasks in Admin, please verify the floor cleaning task to help confirm my presence there before I moved towards Weapons.
